A crazy house party with delectable food, mood lighting, a curated playlist, and a guest-list with every possible person you know; the evening is planned. And you suddenly realize you have everything covered, except the alcohol! You make infinite calls, you run to the nearest wine shop, but to no avail. It’s too late to even ask people to BYOB! Imagine the horrors?!

Well, we get the plight! And that’s why, we make sure your plans never have to take a hit because of missing/shortfall/absence of alcohol.

There has been tremendous change in the buying habits of people in India. From purchasing things physically, people have now moved to purchasing products online. The post-pandemic era has witnessed a great surge in the purchase of alcohol online, too. The availability of more options from around the world, competitive pricing, and the comfort of ordering from home, have all led to the growth of online purchases. The growth in the number of female consumers has also led to a boost in the alcohol industry.

Understanding these purchase patterns, we, The Liquor Store, bring to you the virtual experience and comfort of ordering your favourite drink from our website and app (link to the app). From the finest wines of Italy to the most exotic scotch from Scotland – we bring the finest spirits of the world to your fingertips. And if you are a chilled beer lover, we’ve got that covered too!

With 30 years of expertise in bringing the finest alcohol to your doorsteps, we are now ready to offer you the best alcohol from around the world right at your fingertips.
